Package Model

Class SessionData

java.lang.Object
Model.SessionData
public abstract class SessionData extends Object
This class holds relevant session data as well as being the point of conversion of time for the user's session and the parsing of strings formatted to show additional information during the application session.

    • setUsernameAndLogs

      public static void setUsernameAndLogs(String username)
      Records the username of the user for the current session. This is only called when username and password have been validated.
      Parameters:
      username - is the username successfully used in the login screen.

      This method records a login attempt to a text file.
      Parameters:
      userName - - the username of the login attempt
      successfulLogin - - the boolean indicating if the login attempt was successful

    • convertUTCtoLocal

      public static String convertUTCtoLocal(String dateAndTimeUTC)
      This method converts UTC date and time as a string to local date and time as a string. Local time is the local time of the JVM.
      Parameters:
      dateAndTimeUTC - - a string containing the date and time in UTC timezone
      Returns:
      a string containing the date and time provided but converted to the local timezone

    • parseCommaString

      public static String parseCommaString(String string)
      This method parses a string from a comma delimiter till the end of the string, not including a space after the comma.
      Parameters:
      string - - the string to be parsed after the comma and space delimiter
      Returns:
      - the latter portion of the provided string after a comma and space delimiter

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      - the date from the data and time provided, as a string
